message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I think it will be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12,000?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it provides.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but $17,000 is still a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $14,000? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
